titleStmt.title: The sinners redemption. Wherein is described the blessed nativity of our Lord Jesus Christ, together with his life on earth, and his precious death on the crosse for mankind. To the tune of, The bleeding heart. Or, In Creet, &c.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "All you that are to mirth inclin'd ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
